decisions.name: Create_new_or_link_to_existing
decisions.label: Create new or link to existing

fields.name: StopJobText
fields.fieldText: STOP THE JOB Triggers – I / We will stop the job if any of the following occur:

fields.name: TaskDescription
fields.fieldText: ﻿Complete Task Steps / Potential Hazards

fields.name: DISPLAY
fields.fieldText: REMEMBER: THIS TABLE DOES NOT INCLUDE ALL POSSIBLE HAZARDS. IT IS EXPECTED THAT THE REQUIRED PPE FOR THE ACTIVITY AND WORK CONDITIONS WILL BE USED.

fields.name: HazardInfo
fields.fieldText: Which of the Hazards below would apply to this task?

fields.name: If_Job_Description_above_does_not_apply
fields.fieldText: If Job Description above does not apply:

fields.name: Identify_the_most_serious_potential_injury_for_the_task_being_performed
fields.fieldText: Identify the most serious potential injury for the task being performed:

fields.name: Work_Site
fields.fieldText: WORK SITE VERIFICATION﻿

fields.name: Work_Team_Details
fields.fieldText:
The Work Team has assessed the worksite conditions and confirms:

  • The JSA addresses the applicable hazards and necessary standards
  • The Team has the appropriate resources (people & equipment) to do the job safely
  • Others that could be affected by the work have been informed
  • Energy isolation (if applicable) has been VERIFIED and DEMONSTRATED

fields.name: Name_Task
fields.helpText: Enter your name or list the person in charge of the job.

fields.name: Complete_Section
fields.fieldText: COMPLETE SECTION BELOW FOR JSA﻿

fields.name: I_acknowledge_I_have_reviewed_the_JSA_I_understand_my_roles_and_responsibilities
fields.fieldText: I acknowledge I have reviewed the JSA, I understand my roles and responsibilities and I will comply with the instructions for this task

fields.name: Sto_Work_Obligation
fields.fieldText: Stop Work Obligation Acknowledgement﻿

fields.name: Obligation_Details
fields.fieldText: Stop-work authority permits any person at any level to halt a job or task when a hazardous situation appears imminent.

fields.name: Acknowledge_that_everyone_on_the_job_has_the_obligation_to_Stop_Work_if_the_situ
fields.fieldText: Acknowledge that everyone on the job has the obligation to Stop Work if the situation presents itself.

fields.name: PPE_Required
fields.fieldText:
PPE REQUIRED DURING THIS TASK

(summarize PPE from Task Hazard Assessment)

fields.name: Hard_Hat
fields.fieldText: Hard Hat, Safety Shoes/Boots, Flame Resistant Clothing, Safety Glasses, 4 Gas Monitor
